lead_paragraph: At a hotel in West Point, one of the 52 Americans taken hostage in Iran in 1979 and relatives of others gathered to watch the Super Bowl.

headline.print_headline: 35 Years After Iran Hostages Returned to America, Another Reunion Centering on Football
headline.main: A Super Bowl Reunion 35 Years After Iran Hostages’ American Homecoming

snippet: At a hotel in West Point, one of the 52 Americans taken hostage in Iran in 1979 and relatives of others gathered to watch the Super Bowl.
abstract: Don Cooke and relatives of three other Americans who were taken hostage by Iran in 1979 attend small reunion at Thayer Hotel at United States Military Academy at West Point to watch Super Bowl together; hostages returned to US on January 25, 1981, which was Super Bowl Sunday that year.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
